name: triple colors
description:
triple colors is a good game my friends like my game so make sure you play with three people controls: WASD blue, arrow keys red, and IJKL green

it's a slow game, so we move one character at a time. It's an educational game so if you are a teacher, please share it with your children it really helps a lot.

Press p to change color

Press u to switch back

Press o to make a pattern back to your position

Press m to change color
